name: Phubbing
description: Smartphones are overtaking the family time. Yes, the increased cell phone usage has started hurting the family relationships. It's called phubbing. Phubbing can be defined as looking at a cell phone rather than interacting with the person(s) you are with, and it has started damaging our relationships as couples and even with our kids. Alarming indeed. This NFT is a message to save our relationships, and to save the humanity.
